nodes.text: Carbon processing centers were structures used to convert raw harvested carbon into duraplast. Constructed by droid or organic workers, Carbon processing centers were used by the Gungans, Trade Federation, Galactic Republic, Confederacy of Independent Systems Galactic Empire, Rebel Alliance, Wookiees, and Royal Naboo Security Forces.
Carbon processing centers serve as resource drop-off buildings in the 2001 video game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds and its 2002 expansion pack.
